import React, { useState } from "react"; import Navbar from "../../components/Navbar"; import Footer from "../../components/Footer"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const View = () => { const [message, setMessage] = useState(""); const [writingDirection, setWritingDirection] = useState("ltr"); const product = { id: "asd654sad6sd", name: "Test1", date: new Date(), quantity: 55, price: 20.65, category: "Socks", photoPath: "https://www.coopersofstortford.co.uk/images/products/medium/G029i_1.jpg", }; return ( <>

{message}

All Products
EditButton

{product.name}

ID

{product.id}

 Quantity

{product.quantity} meters

 Price

KWD {product.price}

 Category

{product.category}

 Date

{product.date.toLocaleDateString("en-us", { month: "long", year: "numeric", day: "numeric", })}

); }; export default View;
